summary: The diff only updates project metadata (project_state.json) and does not add any PDF assets or update backend Book.assetPath values, so the core frontend/backend requirements are not implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the missing Honeydew book PDF files to the frontend static assets so every backend Book.assetPath currently returned by getBooks() resolves to a real, publicly accessible file path (no 404 for listed /assets/*.pdf URLs; PDFs load from Landing->Reader via iframe or Open PDF button).
missing_requirements.reason: No static asset files were added in the diff (no PDFs under an assets/static directory), and only a metadata file was modified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the backend book catalog returned by getBooks() matches the added book resources; update Book.assetPath values to match exactly so no UI link 404s.
missing_requirements.reason: No backend source files were modified; only project_state.json was updated, so getBooks()/Book.assetPath cannot have been aligned to asset filenames/paths.
